structured.description: A bald man with a prominent reddish-brown beard is depicted from the chest up, wearing professional business attire. He presents a friendly and approachable demeanor against a dynamic, dark blue digital background with interconnected glowing lines. The overall impression is one of modern professionalism combined with a hint of technological sophistication.
structured.facial_features: Bald head, full reddish-brown beard, dark eyebrows.
structured.expression: A broad, open-mouthed smile revealing white teeth, with eyes looking directly forward.
structured.attire: A black suit jacket, a crisp white collared shirt, and a textured light blue necktie.
structured.palette: Dominant dark blues and blacks, contrasted with white, light blue, and the warm reddish-brown of the beard. The background features glowing light blue elements.
structured.background: A dark blue digital pattern composed of interconnected glowing light blue lines and dots, suggesting a network or data structure.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
